lines.text: Gene, Gene made a machine, and Joe, Joe made it go. Art, Art blew a fart and blew the whole damn thing apart.

[singing along]
It's getting to the point now when I'm with you, I no longer want to have something stuck in my eye... Your mother, my mother ain't never looked like Florence Henderson...

[Referring to his watch]
Mickey! He's Dead! He killed him!
I'm sure the academy will pay for it.
No, you don't understand. It's like a sentimental thing. It was the last thing I stole before joining the academy.
Don't touch those! Don't you ever touch my balls without asking!
People just don't understand me.
Maybe if you talk slower...
No, I mean who I am. Man, now I gotta worry about my diction too?

[Hands over gun to Mrs. Feldman]
Now remember, that's a 44 Magnum and it's quite a...
[Mrs. Feldman shoots target and the blast catapults her to the lodge]
...kick.
Damn, that was fun!
You want to become one with the gun. Feel the gun, caress the gun until it's a living, breathing, vibrating extension of yourself.
I look for the same in a woman.
Gee, sir, I thought you could only get contempt of court for opening your mouth!
Yamma, yamma, yamma, yamma, yahhhhma. Fools! They think they can kill the brother of Medula!
I never thought that.
Oh, if I could reach into the belly of a yak and rip out its heart...
That would bring him back to life?
No, man. I'm hungry!
What is the most frustrating thing about police work?
Not being able to carry hand grenades, sir.
Separate locker rooms, sir.
Icky blue uniforms.
Oh, Zed. Do you think when this is all over we will still see each other?
SHUT UP! Oh, no, not you. I m-m-m-meant the ducks!
[Mahoney talking to Captain Harris, who just ripped his pants trying to get over a fence]
Did anyone tell you what a great tailor you have, Sir?
I mentioned that, just last week.
Citizens On Patrol. What a joke. You know what C.O.P. really stands for Proctor?
No sir what?
Collection Of Pissants.
[Proctor laughs]
That's not funny Proctor.
No sir.
Proctor, this is an alley.
I know sir but these are the directions Mahoney gave me.
Mahoney?
Yes he says this restaurant has the best salad bar in town.
Well it damn sure better have!
[they go inside]
Proctor, I don't see a salad bar.

[sees the name of the restaurant, "The Blue Oyster"]
Look sir. Maybe they serve seafood.
[laughs]
Not funny you idiot!

[finding Zed and Laura by the pool]
This is not a spawning pool!
[Jones enters the cadets' room, making the sound of a creaking door]

[Transylvanian accent]
Good evening, gentlemen. I congratulate you on another good day. Sleep vell...
[evil laugh]
Hey, Count, getting worried we're gonna be taking over soon? We're ready!
You're improving, guys, but you're still way down on the food chain. As we vampires say, "lights out, suckers!"
[leaves, making a wolf howl]
What are you looking at, you... peckerhead!
